featured.text: In 1871, he was appointed to illustrate The Wonders of Yellowstone, a story by Nathaniel P. Langford, who had participated in an expedition to Yellowstone.

definition.zh_def: 探險，特別是為了科學研究或探索而進行的旅行或行動。
definition.en_def: A journey undertaken for a specific purpose, often for exploration or research.
definition.example: The team set out on an expedition to study the effects of climate change in the Arctic.
